page.title: 04THE SCHOOLS IN BINGHAM
page.content: There are four shools in the area:- The Bingham Infants School, Robert Miles Junior, Carnarvon Primary, and Toot Hill Comprehensive. They were built in the years 1909,1965,1968 and 1969 respectively. Here are some comments from children in the schools. {Bingham Infants:}"I like going on the computer." "In our wild area we have got a pond and we have got some frogs and one tadpole." " I like Drama." {Robert Miles Junior:}"I like the grounds and the big playing field." "The computers are brilliant" "We like our new library and the books in it." {Carnarvon Primary:}" The children in our school can study the trees and wild flowers that we planted." "Our school is like a family.""We enjoy it" {Toot Hill Comp:}"It's all right- there are loads of different sports.""We're happy and we{all}do fairly well."
